name: settings
description: Non-volatile key-value storage interface for storing settings.
comment:
## Secrets

Entries with keys starting with `$` are considered secret.
They can be written normally, but they always read as a single `0` byte.
These are typically used by other services on the same device.

contents.name: get
contents.description: Get the value of given setting. If no such entry exists, the value returned is empty.

contents.name: get
contents.description: Get the value of given setting. If no such entry exists, the value returned is empty.

contents.name: set
contents.description: Set the value of a given setting. Empty value indicates that the setting should be deleted.

contents.name: list
contents.description: Return keys and values of all settings.

contents.name: listed_entry
contents.description: Return keys and values of all settings.
